mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Transaction( account_id, category_code, transaction_datetime, amount, balance_after, merchant_name, transaction_type ) VALUES ( #{accountId}, #{categoryCode}, #{transactionDatetime}, #{amount}, #{balanceAfter}, #{merchantName}, #{transactionType} )

INSERT INTO Account( account_type, account_number, account_name, bank_name, interest_rate, member_id ) VALUES ( #{accountType}, #{accountNumber}, #{accountName}, #{bankName}, #{interestRate}, #{memberId} )
